actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-234.
Laid on Table in House by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 3134) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 3134 (appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 3134) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.
